document_data.mainbody: '''Mistletoe''' was a type of small plant in the Realms.

Habitats.Beyond Toril: * Mistletoe could be found growing in the [[plane]] of [[Jotunheim]].

Usages.Magic:
* Mistletoe was required as a [[material component]] for casting a variety of [[spell]]s in the Realms, including ''[[Briartangle]]'', ''[[mold touch]]'', and ''[[smoke ghost]]''. 
* Many of the oldest versions of [[druid]]ic spells used mistletoe as a material component.
* ''[[Runestick]]s'' were typically bound in mistletoe and [[holly]].

Notable Users.Races & Intelligent Creatures:
* Mistletoe was one of the plants that [[asperii]] and [[feystag]]s were known to graze on.
* The [[Bacchae]] typically wore vegetative crowns that were sometimes made of mistletoe.
Notable Users.Religion:
* Mistletoe was considered holy to most druids. They typically felt that the proper way to harvest this plant was with a [[sickle]] made of either [[silver]] or [[gold]] and catching it in a bowl before it touched the ground. Not harvesting in this manner was believed to reduce the potency of mistletoe.
* Whenever worshipers of [[Silvanus]] performed a vigil they would anoint themselves with a powder made of crushed mistletoe leaves and acorns, mixed with water from either rain or a spring.

document_data.Trivia: * A cluster of mistletoe was one of the symbols of the [[Earthmother]].
